title: The gas stove myth
description:
The oil industry spent decades convincing Americans that there was something special about cooking with gas. Rebecca Leber (@RebLeber) explains. 
Read Rebecca’s story: https://www.motherjones.com/environment/2021/02/how-the-fossil-fuel-industry-convinced-americans-to-love-gas-stoves/
This episode was made by: 


Host: Teddy Schleifer (@teddyschleifer



Producer: Sofi LaLonde (@sofilalonde)


Engineer: Paul Mounsey
